Summary: If you like it strong, this one's for you!
text: This variety is strong and bold!  The price is reasonable as it is.  But, if you want to stretch your K-cup value even more, you can make 2 cups from one K-cup.  I brew a medium and a small cup into my large coffee cup.  And, it's still a strong cup of coffee!  I like this so much that I signed up for subscribe and save!
